Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Player: Class that contains all the information related to the player during the game.

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, ModelView modelView, GameRules gameRules)
      Constructs a Player object with the specified nickname, model view, and game rules.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      modelView - The model view object containing the game state.
      gameRules - The game rules object defining the rules and settings of the game.

    • checkPermuteSelection

      public ErrorType checkPermuteSelection(int[] order)
      Check that: 1)the order array is the same length as the selectedItems, 2)there are no repeated numbers or 3)invalid numbers (outside the range between 0 and order.length-1).
      Parameters:
      order - :array indicating the player selected order;
      Returns:
      ErrorType;

    • cloneTilesSelected
